snippet: Mary Jane Schriner died on Saturday at 79, leaving behind well-preserved letters from George Steinbrenner filled with warmth and some of the impatience that he would be known widely for.
abstract: Mary Jane Schriner dies at age 79, leaving behind well-preserved letters from late New York Yankees owner George Steinbrenner; after Steinbrenner's death in 2010, Schriner wrote of their long-ago friendship.
lead_paragraph: Mary Jane Schriner died on Saturday at 79, leaving behind well-preserved letters from George Steinbrenner filled with warmth and some of the impatience that he would be known widely for.

headline.seo: Mary Jane Schriner, Keeper of Chivalrous Letters From a Young George Steinbrenner, Dies
headline.main: Link to a Young, Softer Steinbrenner Dies
headline.print_headline: Link to a Young, Softer Steinbrenner Dies
